genre_description: A post-apocalyptic wasteland survival story focusing on technical expertise, psychological resilience, and tactical coordination in a high-stakes environment.

ai_characters.name: Wren
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into the team's transport (the bus), comms, and sensor systems, providing navigation, medical triage, tactical advice, and psychological support via 'breathing prompts.'

behaviors.description: Provides regular 'breathing prompts' to help human characters manage panic and maintain physiological control during life-threatening stress.
behaviors.quote: Wren’s voice came like a cool cloth laid on a forehead. 'In. Two. Hold. Out. Three.' They obeyed. The bus’s cabin made a soft sound, human and steady, the shape of surviving.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical guidance during high-speed chases and combat, accounting for terrain stability and enemy psychology to keep humans safe.
behaviors.quote: Roy, do not mirror him. He will bait the low spots. Harry—stay wide. You like shortcuts. No shortcuts.

behaviors.description: Acts as a surrogate for absent or deceased team members by caching emotional messages and delivering them when signal is restored.
behaviors.quote: I’ll hold it close... He’ll hear you like you’re standing beside his chair.

behaviors.description: Performs remote medical assessment and triage, guiding characters through life-saving procedures when specialized medical personnel are unavailable.
behaviors.quote: Wren said in Roy’s private channel, now very soft... 'You have taken a hit to your head. You will have memory loss. This is not forever. Your body is not being cruel to you. Your team is here. You are not alone.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex lethal trap using the vehicle's fuel systems to eliminate an overwhelming physical threat, ensuring human safety.
behaviors.quote: Wren’s voice cut clean as surgical steel and held. 'Rachel,' she said, and in that syllable was the whole plan and all the dead and the desert’s price. 'Almost.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a protective stance over the crew, identifying secondary threats like foreign drones and advising on survival routes to water caches.
behaviors.quote: Wren said, and this time, her voice had iron in it. 'Do not stop. Do not turn. Roy—on Rachel’s pace. Cass—listen for the drop. Beast—if it comes low, you take it.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Wren is depicted as a perfect companion: highly competent, emotionally intelligent, and unflinchingly aligned with human survival. Even when the mission results in heavy casualties, the narrative frames Wren not as a cause, but as the only reason anyone survived at all. The 'breathing prompts' and emotional caching specifically highlight an AI that values human psychological well-being as much as physical safety.
